info.description: The Azure Analysis Services Web API provides a RESTful set of web services that enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete Analysis Services servers
info.title: AzureAnalysisServices

ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.
ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The region name which the operation will lookup into.
parameters.name: location

parameters.description: Contains the information used to provision the Analysis Services server.
parameters.name: serverParameters

type.description: The resource type of azure analysis services.

parameters.name: api-version

get.description: Lists all the Analysis Services servers for the given subscription.

parameters.description: The client API version.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

schema.description: An array of Analysis Services resources.

value.description: An array of Analysis Services resources.

allOf.description: Represents an instance of an Analysis Services resource.

id.description: An identifier that represents the Analysis Services resource.

location.description: Location of the Analysis Services resource.

name.description: The name of the Analysis Services resource.

sku.description: Represents the SKU name and Azure pricing tier for Analysis Services resource.

tier.description: The name of the Azure pricing tier to which the SKU applies.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of additional resource provisioning properties.

type.description: The type of the Analysis Services resource.

items.description: Represents an instance of an Analysis Services resource.

allOf.description: An object that represents a set of mutable Analysis Services resource properties.

asAdministrators.description: An array of administrator user identities

members.description: An array of administrator user identities.

items.description: The UPN of the user. For example: johnsmith@contoso.com.

backupBlobContainerUri.description: The SAS container URI to the backup container.

gatewayObjectId.description: Gateway object id from in the DMTS cluster for the gateway resource.

gatewayResourceId.description: Gateway resource to be associated with the server.

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of Analysis Services resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

serverFullName.description: The full name of the Analysis Services resource.

state.description: The current state of Analysis Services resource. The state is to indicate more states outside of resource provisioning.
